listitem.simpara: The ReflectionResourceProperty now throws ResourcePropertyException instead of Exception.
Since the Axis version was upgraded the Axis generated classes might be slightly different in certain cases. Please see Axis changes for more details.
will NOT overwrite the existing GAR deployment by default now. Please see GAR deployment/undeployment changes for more details.
The command line syntax of the and tools has changed slightly. The tools now accept the options first followed by the required arguments.
